aboutSection.title: About AURUM
aboutSection.content:
AURUM has established itself as a thoughtful developer on the Costa Blanca, prioritizing quality construction and community amenities over mass-market volume. Their developments reflect an understanding of what modern buyers expect: functional design, reliable build standards, and locations with genuine potential for growth and appreciation.

Based in the Losea region, AURUM focuses on mid-scale residential projects that enhance local communities while maintaining reasonable pricing and strong construction values. The developer's approach emphasizes practical finishes and genuine buyer benefits rather than unnecessary frills.
